tgt_original: 夫食肉者，身體臭穢惡名流布，賢聖善人不用親狎，是故菩薩不應食肉。

src_original: ṛṣibhojanāhāro hi mahāmate āryajano na māṃsarudhirāhāraḥ,
tgt_original: 大慧！

src_original: ityato 'pi bodhisattvasya māṃsamabhakṣyam //
tgt_original: 夫血肉者，眾仙所棄群聖不食，是故菩薩不應食肉。

src_original: bahujanacittānurakṣaṇatayāpi apavādaparihāraṃ cecchataḥ śāsanasya mahāmate māṃsamabhakṣyaṃ kṛpātmano bodhisattvasya /  tadyathā mahāmate bhavanti loke śāsanāpavādavaktāraḥ /  kiṃcitteṣāṃ śrāmaṇyam,
tgt_original: 大慧！ 菩薩為護眾生信心，令於佛法不生譏謗，以慈愍故不應食肉。

src_original: kuto vā brāhmaṇyam?  yannāmaite pūrvarṣibhojanānyapāsya kravyādā ivāmiṣāhārāḥ paripūrṇakukṣayaḥ khabhūmijalasaṃniśritān sūkṣmāṃstrāsayanto jantūn samutrāsayanta imaṃ lokaṃ samantataḥ paryaṭanti /  nihatameṣāṃ śrāmaṇyam,
tgt_original: 大慧！ 若我弟子食噉於肉，令諸世人悉懷譏謗，而作是言： 『云何沙門修淨行人，棄捨天仙所食之味，猶如惡獸食肉滿腹，遊行世間，令諸眾生悉懷驚怖，壞清淨行，失沙門道？

src_original: tasmādbahujanacittānurakṣaṇatayāpi apavādaparihāraṃ cecchataḥ śāsanasya mahāmate māṃsaṃṃ sarvamabhakṣyaṃ kṛpātmano bodhisattvasya //
tgt_original: 』菩薩慈愍為護眾生，令不生於如是之心，不應食肉。

src_original: na kaścidgandhaviśeṣaḥ /  samamubhayamāṃsayordahyamānayordaurgandhyam /
tgt_original: 如燒人肉其氣臭穢，與燒餘肉等無差別，云何於中有食不食？

src_original: ato 'pi mahāmate śucikāmasya yoginaḥ sarvaṃ māṃsamabhakṣyaṃ bodhisattvasya //
tgt_original: 是故一切樂清淨者不應食肉。

src_original: śmaśānikānāṃ ca mahāmate araṇyavanaprasthānyamanuṣyāvacarāṇi prāntāni śayanāsanānyadhyāvasatāṃ  yogināṃ yogācārāṇāṃ maitrīvihāriṇāṃ vidyādharāṇāṃ vidyāṃ sādhayitukāmānāṃ vidyāsādhanamokṣavighnakaratvānmahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ  kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca sarvayogasādhanāntarāyakaramityapi samanupaśyatāṃ mahāmate
tgt_original: 大慧！ 諸善男女塚間樹下阿蘭若處寂靜修行，或住慈心或持呪術，或求解脫或趣大乘，以食肉故，一切障礙不得成就，是故菩薩欲利自他不應食肉。 大慧！

src_original: svaparātmahitakāmasya māṃsaṃ sarvamabhakṣyaṃ bodhisattvasya /  rūpālambanavijñānapratyayāsvādajanakatvādapi sarvabhūtātmabhūtasya kṛpātmanaḥ sarvaṃ māṃsamabhakṣyaṃ bodhisattvasya /  devatā api cainaṃ parivarjayantīti kṛtvā mahāmate kṛpātmanaḥ sarvaṃ māṃsamabhakṣyaṃ bodhisattvasya /  mukhaṃ cāsya paramadurgandhi ihaiva tāvajjanmani,
tgt_original: 夫食肉者，見其形色則已生於貪滋味心，菩薩慈念一切眾生猶如己身，云何見之而作食想？

src_original: ityapi kṛtvā mahāmate kṛpātmanaḥ sarvaṃ māṃsamabhakṣyaṃ bodhisattvasya /
tgt_original: 是故菩薩不應食肉。

src_original: niṣadya upacārātsmitapūrvaṃ bhagavatā kṛtāvakāśo bhagavanta praśnadvayaṃ pṛcchati sma - pṛṣṭā mayā pūrvakāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ  taiścāpi visarjitam /  bhagavantamapyetarhi pṛcchāmi /  deśanāpāṭhe cāyaṃ buddhaistvayā cāvaśyamanuvarṇitaṃ bhaviṣyati /
tgt_original: 「我今欲問如來二義，如是二義，我已曾問過去如來、應、正等覺，彼佛世尊已為我說。 我今亦欲問於是義，唯願如來為我宣說。

src_original: pāpakāṃśca romaharṣaṇān svapnān paśyanti /  śūnyāgārasthitasya caikākino rahogatasya viharato 'syāmanuṣyāstejo haranti /  utrasyantyapi,  kadācitsaṃtrasyantyapi,  saṃtrāsamakasmāccāpadyante,  āhāre ca mātrāṃ na jānāti nāpyaśitapītakhāditākhāditasya samyagrasapariṇāmapuṣṭyādi samāsādayati,
tgt_original: 夫食肉者諸天遠離，口氣常臭，睡夢不安覺已憂悚，夜叉惡鬼奪其精氣，心多驚怖，食不知足，增長疾病易生瘡癬，恒被諸蟲之所唼食，不能於食深生厭離。

src_original: (Vaidya 102) putramāṃsabhaiṣajyavadāhāraṃ deśayaṃścāhaṃ mahāmate kathamiva anāryajanasevitamāryajanavivarjitamevamanekadoṣāvahamanekaguṇavivarjitamanṛṣibhojanapraṇītamakalpyaṃ  māṃsarudhirāhāraṃ śiṣyebhyo 'nujñāpyāmi?  anujñātavān punarahaṃ mahāmate sarvāryajanasevitamanāryajanavivarjitamanekaguṇavāhakamanekadoṣavivarjitaṃ sarvapūrvarṣipraṇītaṃ bhojanam,
tgt_original: 『凡所食噉作子肉想。 』餘食尚然，云何而聽弟子食肉。 大慧！ 肉非美好、肉不清淨，生諸罪惡敗諸功德，諸仙聖人之所棄捨，云何而許弟子食耶？ 若言許食，此人謗我。

src_original: yaduta śāliyavagodhūmamudgamāṣamasūrādisarpistailamadhuphāṇitaguḍakhaṇḍamatsyaṇḍikādiṣu samupapadyamānaṃ bhojanaṃ kalpyamiti kṛtvā /  na ca mahāmate anāgate 'dhvani ekeṣāṃ mohapuruṣāṇāṃ vividhavinayavikalpavādināṃ kravyādakulavāsitāvāsitānāṃ rasatṛṣṇāvyavasitānāmidaṃ praṇītaṃ bhojanaṃ pratibhāṣyate /  na tu mahāmate pūrvajinakṛtādhikārāṇāmavaropitakuśalamūlānāṃ śrāddhānāmavikalpānāṃ
tgt_original: 「大慧！ 淨美食者，應知則是粳米粟米大小麥豆蘇油石蜜，如是等類，此是過去諸佛所許，我所稱說。

src_original: bahulānāṃ śākyakulakulīnānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ kāyajīvitabhogānadhyavasitānāmarasagṛdhrāṇāmalolupānāṃ  kṛpālūnāṃ sarvabhūtātmabhūtatāmupagantukāmānāṃ sarvasattvaikaputrakapriyadarśināṃ  bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānamiti vadāmi //
tgt_original: 我種性中諸善男女，心懷淨信久植善根，於身命財不生貪著，慈愍一切猶如己身，如是之人之所應食，非諸惡習虎狼性者心所愛重。

src_original: bhūtapūrvaṃ mahāmate atīte 'dhvani rājābhūtsiṃhasaudāso nāma /  sa māṃsabhojanāhārātiprasaṅgena pratisevamāno rasatṛṣṇādhyavasānaparamatayā māṃsāni mānuṣyāṇyapi bhakṣitavān /  tannidānaṃ ca mitrāmātyajñātibandhuvargeṇāpi parityaktaḥ,
tgt_original: 「大慧！ 過去有王名師子生，耽著肉味食種種肉，如是不已遂至食人，臣民不堪悉皆離叛，亡失國位受大苦惱。

src_original: pūrvajanmamāṃsādavāsanādoṣācchyenarūpamāsthāya kapotaveṣarūpadhārī viśvakarmā samabhidruto 'bhūt /

src_original: tulāyāṃ cātmānamāropita āsīt /  yasmādrājā anaparādhibhūtānukampakaḥ śibī duḥkhena mahatā lambhitaḥ /

src_original: tadevamanekajanmābhyastamapi mahāmate devendrabhūtasya śakrasyāpi sataḥ svaparadoṣāvahanamabhūt,
tgt_original: 「大慧！ 帝釋餘習尚惱眾生，況餘無慚常食肉者。

src_original: anyeṣāṃ ca mahāmate narendrabhūtānāṃ satāmaśvenāpahṛtānāmaṭavyāṃ paryaṭamānānāṃ siṃhyā  saha maithunaṃ gatavatāṃ jīvitabhayādapatyāni cotpāditavantaḥ siṃhasaṃvāsānvayātkalmāṣapādaprabhṛtayo  nṛpaputrāḥ pūrvajanmamāṃsādadoṣavāsanatayā manuṣyendrabhūtā api santo māṃsādā abhūvan /  ihaiva ca mahāmate janmani saptakuṭīrake 'pi grāme pracuramāṃsalaulyādatiprasaṅgena niṣevamānā mānuṣamāṃsādā ghorā ḍākā vā ḍākinyaśca saṃjāyante
tgt_original: 昔有一王乘馬遊獵，馬驚奔逸入於山險，既無歸路又絕人居，有牝師子與同遊處，遂行醜行生諸子息，其最長者名曰班足，後得作王領七億家，食肉餘習非肉不食，初食禽獸後乃至人，所生男女悉是羅剎。

src_original: jātiparivarte ca mahāmate tathaiva māṃsarasādhyavasānatayā siṃhavyāghradvīpivṛkatarakṣumārjārajambukolūkādipracuramāṃsādayoniṣu  pracuratarapiśitāśanā rākṣasādighoratarayoniṣu vinipātyante /  yatra vinipatitānāṃ duḥkhena mānuṣyayonirapi samāpadyate,  prāgave nirvṛtiḥ /
tgt_original: 轉此身已，復生師子豺狼虎豹雕鷲等中，欲求人身終不可得，況出生死涅槃之道。

src_original: ityevamādayo mahāmate māṃsādadoṣāḥ prāgeva niṣevamānānāṃ samupajāyante,  viparyayācca bhūyāṃso guṇāḥ /  na ca mahāmate bālapṛthagjanā (Vaidya 103)  etāṃścānyāṃśca guṇadoṣānavabudhyante /
tgt_original: 「大慧！ 夫食肉者有如是等無量過失，斷而不食獲大功德，凡愚不知如是損益，是故我今為汝開演，凡是肉者悉不應食。

src_original: evamādiguṇadoṣadarśanānmahāmate māṃsaṃ sarvamabhakṣyaṃ kṛpātmano bodhisattvasyeti vadāmi //  yadi ca mahāmate māṃsaṃ na kathaṃcana kecana bhakṣayeyuḥ,  na tannidānaṃ ghāteran /

src_original: mūlyahetorhi mahāmate prāyaḥ prāṇino niraparādhino vadhyante svalpādanyahetoḥ /  kaṣṭaṃ mahāmate rasatṛṣṇāyāmatisevatāṃ māṃsāni mānuṣānyapi mānuṣairbhakṣyante,  kiṃ punaritaramṛgapakṣiprāṇisaṃbhūtamāṃsāni /  prāyo mahāmate māṃsarasatṛṣṇārtairidaṃ tathā tathā jālayantramāviddhaṃ mohapuruṣaiḥ,
tgt_original: 奇哉世間貪著肉味，於人身肉尚取食之，況於鳥獸有不食者，以貪味故廣設方便，罝羅網罟處處安施，水陸飛行皆被殺害，設自不食為貪價直而作是事。

src_original: satkāyadṛṣṭiyuktā rasatṛṣṇādhyavasitāstāṃ tāṃ māṃsabhakṣaṇahetvābhāsāṃ granthayiṣyanti /  mama cābhūtābhyākhyānaṃ dātavyaṃ maṃsyante /
tgt_original: 世復有人心無慈愍，專行慘暴猶如羅剎，若見眾生其身充盛，便生肉想言此可食。

src_original: bhagavatā māṃsabhojanamanujñātaṃ kalpyamiti /  praṇītabhojaneṣu coktam,
tgt_original: 世無有肉，非是自殺亦非他殺，心不疑殺而可食者，以是義故我許聲聞食如是肉。

tgt_original: 未來之世有愚癡人，於我法中而為出家，妄說毘尼壞亂正法，誹謗於我言聽食肉亦自曾食。

src_original: yadi tu mahāmate anujñātukāmatā me syāt,

src_original: kalpyaṃ vā me śrāvakāṇāṃ pratisevituṃ syāt,  nāhaṃ maitrīvihāriṇāṃ yogināṃ yogācārāṇāṃ śmaśānikānāṃ mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ  kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca sarvasattvaikaputrakasaṃjñābhāvanārthaṃ sarvāmāṃsabhakṣaṇapratiṣedhaṃ kuryām,

src_original: udvejanīyaṃ bhūtānāṃ yogī māṃsaṃ vivarjayet // Lank_8.4 //

tgt_original: 到已下殿右遶三匝，作眾伎樂供養如來。

tgt_original: 世尊！ 變化如來說此二義，非根本佛。

src_original: lābhārthaṃ hanyate sattvo māṃsārthaṃ dīyate dhanam /
tgt_original: 為利殺眾生，　　以財取諸肉；

src_original: (Vaidya 105)  trikoṭiśuddhamāṃsaṃ vai akalpitamayācitam /
tgt_original: 不想不教求，　　此三種名淨；

src_original: acoditaṃ ca naivāsti tasmānmāṃsaṃ na bhakṣayet // Lank_8.12 //  māṃsaṃ na bhakṣayedyogī mayā buddhaiśca garhitam /

tgt_original: 更互相食噉，　　死墮惡獸中；

src_original: durgandhiḥ kutsanīyaśca unmattaścāpi jāyate /

tgt_original: 諸佛及菩薩，　　聲聞所嫌惡。

tgt_original: 《象脇》與《大雲》，　　《涅槃》、《央掘摩》， 及此《楞伽經》，　　我皆制斷肉。

src_original: maunā hi bhagavaṃstathāgatāḥ samādhisukhagocaramevodbhāvayanti /  na ca gocaraṃ vikalpayanti /

src_original: dṛṣṭaśrutaviśaṅkābhiḥ sarvaṃ māṃsaṃ vivarjayet /

src_original: yathaiva rāgo mokṣasya antarāyakaro bhavet /  tathaiva māṃsamadyādyā antarāyakaro bhavet // Lank_8.20 //
